Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder section of a red-brown pottery wine-jar, interior and exterior slightly grooved, both also covered with traces of light-brown clay deposit, with remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text on the exterior.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393096) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393096)
Associated places: Named in inscription: House of Aten
